skins.name: Brant
skins.description: A costume the captain wears on his grand voyages. Its design inspires the garments of the Troupe of Fools. It captures the hues of sea and sky, bringing their grandeur back to Ragunna.

tags.name: Fusion DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Fusion DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Resonance Skill DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Resonance Skill DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

175.name: By Currents and Winds
175.description:
<color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> temporarily causes nearby targets to stagnate while casting. The stagnation effect is removed when Brant is switched off the field.
After casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Applaud for Me!</color> or each <color=Highlight>flip</color> following Mid-air Attack, Brant's DMG dealt is increased by {0} for {1}s, stacking up to {2} times.

176.name: For Smiles and Cheers
176.description:
Casting <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> and <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> increases Brant's Crit. Rate by {0}. 
Brant's Outro Skill <color=Highlight>The Course is Set!</color> gains a new enhancement:
When <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> cast by the incoming Resonator (or nearby Resonators who activate Brant's Outro Skill) hits a target within {2}s after Brant's Outro Skill, Brant blasts the hit target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color> equal to {1} of Brant's ATK (considered Basic Attack DMG). This explosion can be triggered <SapTag=3>{3}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=time P=times SapTag=3} per second, up to {4} explosions in total.
- This effect remains active when Brant is switched off the field.

177.name: Through Storms I Sail
177.description: The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> is increased by {0}.

178.name: To Freedom I Sing
178.description: The Shield obtained from <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> is increased by {0}. Casting <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> restores HP for all nearby Resonators in the team ({2} HP for every {1} Energy Regen).

179.name: All the World's an Actor's Stage
179.description: Dealing Basic Attack DMG gives Brant {0} <color=Highlight>Basic Attack DMG Bonus</color> for {1}s.

180.name: All the World's a Captain's Carnevale
180.description: <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack's</color> DMG Multiplier is increased by {0}. Casting <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> causes a secondary blast, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color> equal to {1} of the DMG dealt by <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.

params.name: Captain's Rhapsody
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Rhapsodic Riff</color></size>
Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
- After performing Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Stage 2</color> or <color=Highlight>Stage 4</color>, hold Normal Attack to perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Rhapsodic Riff</color>.
-  After performing <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 4</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack to perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Rhapsodic Riff</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack following Mid-air Attack <color=Highlight>Stage 1</color> or <color=Highlight>Stage 2</color> to swing to the target with Grapple. Brant will attack the target if he reaches them with the swing. Release while in action to <color=Highlight>flip backward</color> after the attack hits; or hold Normal Attack to attack the target continuously and <color=Highlight>flip backward</color> after the finishing move. Brant <color=Highlight>flips backward</color> automatically after <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 3</color>. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack after each <color=Highlight>flip</color> to perform the next stage of <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color>. <color=Highlight>Flip</color> resets Mid-air Dodge attempts.
- If Brant fails to reach the target with the Grapple swing of <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 1</color>, he instead performs a slash forward, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
- If Brant reaches the target with the Grapple swing of <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 1</color> or <color=Highlight>Stage 2</color> but the attack fails to hit the target, he will drop down after a temporary suspension in mid-air.
<size=10> </size> 
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> right after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.

1206008.name: Mid-air Attack Stage 1: Charged Attack DMG

1206011.name: Mid-air Attack Stage 2: Charged Attack DMG

1206018.name: Heavy Attack - Rhapsodic Riff STA Cost

params.name: Anchors Aweigh!
params.description:
Brant launches himself into the air and blasts all targets in an area, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>. While in mid-air, if <te href=850050>Bravo</te> is not full, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Anchors Aweigh!</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Plunging Attack</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Plunging Attack</color></size>
Plunge at the target at the cost of STA, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, which is considered <color=Highlight>Basic Attack DMG</color>.
- If Brant fails to reach the target with the Grapple swing of <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 1</color>, he instead performs a slash forward. Afterward, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack to perform <color=Highlight>Plunging Attack</color>.
- If Brant reaches the target with the Grapple swing of Mid-air Attack <color=Highlight>Stage 1</color> or <color=Highlight>Stage 2</color> but the attack fails to hit the target, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack to perform <color=Highlight>Plunging Attack</color> during the suspension.
<size=10> </size>

params.name: To the Horizon
params.description:
Deal <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color> to targets within the range and heal all nearby Resonators in the team before entering the <color=Highlight>Aflame</color> state.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aflame</color></size>
The efficiency of gaining Bravo is increased by {1} when <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Anchors Aweigh!</color> hits the target. Meanwhile, Forte Circuit <color=Highlight><te href=850052>Theatrical Moment</te></color> is replaced by <color=Highlight>"My" Moment</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>"My" Moment</color></size>
Brant gains additional ATK based on his Energy Regen: For every {3} of his Energy Regen over {2}, Brant gains additional {4} points of ATK, up to {5}.
<size=10> </size>

params.name: Voyager's Blaze
params.description: Healing provided by <color=Highlight><te href=850053>Waves of Acclaims</te></color> is increased by {0}.

params.name: Trial by Fire and Tide
params.description: Brant's resistance to interruption is increased during <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attacks</color> and gains {0} <color=Fire>Fusion DMG Bonus</color>.

params.name: Applaud for Me!
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, and gain <color=Highlight>Interlude Applause</color> effect.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Interlude Applause</color></size>
The next Mid-air Attack begins at <color=Highlight>Stage 2</color>. This effect ends when Brant lands early or is switched out.

params.name: Ocean Odyssey
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Theatrical Moment</color></size>
Brant gains additional ATK based on his Energy Regen: For every 1% of his Energy Regen over {0}, Brant gains additional {1} points of ATK, up to {2}.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Waves of Acclaims</color></size>
Heal all nearby Resonators in the team when Bravo reaches {3}, {4}, {5}, and {6}.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Returned from Ashes</color></size>
When Bravo is full, replace Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Anchor Aweigh!</color> with <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color>.
Consume all Bravo to perform <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, considered <color=Highlight>Basic Attack DMG</color>, and generate a shield for all nearby Resonators in the team. Casting this skill when in <color=Highlight><te href=850051>Aflame</te></color> ends this state after <color=Highlight>Returned from Ashes</color> ends.
- The shield cannot be transferred when the Resonator on the field is switched off.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Bravo</color></size>
Brant can hold up to {7} Bravo.
- Obtain Bravo when Normal Attacks hit the target.
- Obtain Bravo when Intro Skill hits the target.
- Obtain Bravo when Resonance Skill hits the target.

params.name: The Course is Set!
params.description: Amplify the incoming Resonator's Fusion DMG by {0} and Resonance Skill DMG by {1} for {2}s or until the Resonator is switched out.

params.name: Tune Break: Sword
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
